algorithm_technique: Prefix sums to efficiently calculate subarray sums.
Iterate through possible split points 'j', storing sums of first parts in a hashmap.
problem_summary_simple: Find if an array can be split into four subarrays with equal sums.
problem_summary_technical: Use prefix sums and nested loops with a hashmap to find four split points (i, j, k) yielding equal subarray sums.
key_insights: Prefix sums are essential for O(1) calculation of subarray sums.
The problem requires finding three split points (i, j, k) that divide the array into four parts.
A hashmap is used to store the sums of the first part (0 to i-1) for efficient lookup when considering the second part (i+1 to j-1).
